captions.text:
MALE SPEAKER: Can I tell
you something?

MALE SPEAKER: He's not
just my friend.

FEMALE SPEAKER: I am
so proud of you.

ELLEN DEGENERES: There have been
moments in history when

someone has had the courage to
stand up for what they believe

in, and that one action
changes everything.

MALE SPEAKER: Well
here we are!

FEMALE SPEAKER: I am
living proof that

title: Show your pride. Share your love. #ProudToLove

comments.text:
Us gays have been ridiculed almost our whole lives, so coming out is pretty 
hard. You never know whether your parents, friends or whoever your telling 
will react to you being different. "Being proud" means be proud that you're 
gay and embrace it, rather then try to change yourself. Because you can't. 
It's impossible.

comments.text:

abomination.
Many times homosexual people are oppressed by others. Maybe bullied and

It's hard to confess something when so many people are against, sometimes 
including parts of the family. I've heard of and seen many cases where 
parents disowned their child, because they were gay.

comments.author: Bananas Ride

comments.text:
+Fatima Omer This is not to attack you in any way, I'm seriously just 
curious to the answers. How is it "Natural" to be Straight? And because you 
say that Gay people choose to be that way you're probably referring to the 
fact that there is no "Gay Gene". But is there a Straight Gene then? If 
not, then why is everyone talking about the "Gay" gene?
comments.author: Bram Stroomer

comments.text:
Before puberty usually one doesn't get excited about sex (generally, 
excluding anomalies). Naturally we are inclined towards the opposite sex 
and even science has shown that a female and male produce offspring. The 
MAIN reason why we have sexual intercourse is to produce offspring. One is 
not born Gay. If you find substantial evidence, then I shall take my step 
back, and join that side of the argument, with my sincere apologies. 
However I feel this is 100% unlikely.
comments.author: Fatima Omer

comments.text:
+Fatima Omer Okay... And what if you had interests for the other gender 
before puberty? And what makes you think being Straight is "Natural"? Who 
knows?! Maybe being Gay is natural and when you go into puberty people 
choose to be Straight instead.
comments.author: Bram Stroomer

comments.text:
Naturally, we are inclined to the opposite gender. As soon as you reach 
puberty you make your decision to be gay or remain the way you naturally 
were.
comments.author: Fatima Omer

comments.text:
+Fatima Omer That's not what I'm asking, when did you choose to be 
Straight? If you can choose to be Gay you can obviously also choose to be 
Straight. So when did you decide to be Straight?

comments.text:
I would change the terminology we use. It's normal to abnormal (no offence

comments.text:
Because i live on this planet and i have a a say so in this world like

comments.author: Voodoo child Bantu man

comments.text:
And the whole point of this is why were you here ? Why do you care to 
comment your opinion here ? If it doesn't pertain to you and it doesn't 
affect your life and you don't agree why comment that you don't ? This is a 
post to help the lgbtq community not to house people opinions about not 
liking the lifestyle and sir I'm not confused I understand exactly how I 
was born and I doubt you have had a long conversation with your children's 
friends to hear about their story of how they came to terms that's they 
were born the way they are. Just think this you yourself.... When did you 
decide that you were straight ? Or if it just seemed the norm to you cause 
you didn't chose it was just apart of you but like I said I just came to 
voice my opinion the same as you did goodbye
comments.author: Brandon Barham

comments.text:
You are the one who wants to win the argument. I would expect that coming 
from a teenager, who can not explain why hes gay. Listen you can not wish 
that on my children lol. You really got some nerves. My son is straight and 
my daughter is straight and they do have gay friends who knows why they are 
gay. They never came up with the "i was a girl in a boy body" they chose 
it. How am i using gay jokes and i am not joking? My opinion is making you 
uncomfortable because you are confuse. You found my old post offensive 
about if the world started off gay you and i won't be here. Which is true. 
You was born by man and woman, you know this. Grow some tough skin and if 
you can not handle someone's opinion, do yourself a favor and live your 
life. You could ignore the comment all together. I respect anyone who 
accept a person that made a choice, rather than saying i can't help it. I 
think anyone can agree. I take back what i said to you. You not all that 
bright. You a spoil boy who wants everyone to have a one side view of 
things. Not in the real world. I Never said gays are gross or god does not 
love them or they going to burn in hell. I said if you wanted to lower the 
population grow the gay society to the point there are no more straight 
people. Now calling you a fag or homo would be disrespectful, but i don't 
need vulgar words to explain my harmless opinion
comments.author: Voodoo child Bantu man

comments.text:
You contradict your self so much and using gay as a joke isn't funny. But 
I'm honestly done with this conversation because you don't listen to anyone 
else to learn to understand it's just you so have a nice life. Hopefully 
your son or daughter is gay or has a really close relationship with someone 
that is gay so you will one day truly understand.
comments.author: Brandon Barham

comments.text:
I support you with highest respect no matter what you choose as your sex 
life only because you bright, but seriously truly learn about yourself 
more. Understand your body and most importantly your mind.
comments.author: Voodoo child Bantu man

comments.text:
Being uneducated has nothing to do with this. I am pretty much educated. Do 
me a favor young one, find the symptoms of being gay. What diesase is 
making young men like you gay? If you do find the damn cure, but if you 
chose to be gay, admit that and live with it. That is my true problem with 
gays. They say they have no choice.
comments.author: Voodoo child Bantu man

comments.text:
Last thing i was only teasing you about the cards. I collected rocks and 
action figures when i was twenty. And i still have them. You being so blind 
and offensive, you fail to see i called you a bright person. The world is 
not against gays, you not that important. Gay only means you like the same

Somewhere down the line you made a choice the same sex is more appealing
comments.author: Voodoo child Bantu man

comments.text:
I'm sorry I'm having a hard time giving kindness to everyone when you use 
the term "gay bracelets" which leads to me to call you ignorant which just 
means uneducated so it's. It far fetched. But my point is you are saying 
you will always be nice to them and stuff like that, what's the point of 
saying you don't agree with it, why did you come on the video, why did you 
comment. Your actions could have caused a child that needs some 
understanding a guidance to refer to places and your comment has made them 
even more afraid of the things they are going through. I'm not here to be 
rude to you because I have said nothing rude just the truth. Words can help 
or hurt people and yours aren't doing to great right now.
comments.author: Brandon Barham

comments.text:
And your point? Listen i do not give a shit about people being gay. My 
problem is the media making it a big deal. I treat people with kindness. 
Just because i do not agree with gay society that does not mean i hate 
them. Hate is not in my veins. I hate cruel people. You do not like my view 
and opinion on homosexuality, which is ok. To call me ignorant is really a 
far fetch thing. Understand this young man, i am not going to fully 
understand the gay pride thing, simply because i am not gay. Telling 
someone to do something and having a opinion is two different things. Maybe 
you need to continue to grow and learn that every damn thing you hear you 
are not going to like. I took a trip to new dehi, and i seen hate and 
people telling people what to do with their lives because the color of 
their skin. These people that are being treated unfair is called Dalits i 
believe. I hate when you gays compare that straight people treating you 
unfair which is not the case. You need to grow some tough skin because 
people going to say racist shit. And everything is a choice. People fight 
cancer and h.i.v, so if someone believe they are born gay, i find that 
bullshit, thats my OPINION. It does not mean i am a dumbass. I know gay 
people who turn straight again.
comments.author: Voodoo child Bantu man

comments.text:
See that's where your ignorance kicks right back in. Like I have told you 
it's not a decision. Just because someone collects bracelets and yu-gi-oh 
cards doesn't make you any less of a man, it means your not conforming to 
society's views of how you are supposed to "grow up". This "kid" you are 
referring to has his life already planned out and on track to being 
successful. That's not something "kids" do. When you are between the ages 
of 13-17 you are old enough to understand life nothing will change just 
because you hit the age 18 it's just another day of the year. Here's my 
last thing for you. Learn to treat people like you would want to be 
treated. Realize that your opinion can hurt people. Learn that by having 
knowledge and not be so judge mental that you will go further in life. I'm 
not a smart ass I honestly just feel bad for you that you are so 
conservative that the basic ideas if life you have will always be the same 
and basic. I have great day and learn to understand humans before you try 
to tell them what they should do with THEIR LIVES.
comments.author: Brandon Barham

comments.text:
Last thing Brandon. You a bright kid, a little bit of a smart ass but a

comments.author: arttria

comments.text:
+TheHannes15 Zechariah 13:3, Nahum 1:2-8, Nahum 2:2-10, Zephaniah 3:6-10, 
Zephaniah 1:7:18, Zephaniah 1:2-6, Judges 4:17-24, Judges 1:21-35, Judges 
1:1-8

Read at how loving your God is. Here's some more things banned, I bet you 
do quite a few of them.

Burning any yeast or honey in offerings to God (2:11)
Failing to include salt in offerings to God (2:13)
Eating fat (3:17)
Eating blood (3:17)
Failing to testify against any wrongdoing you've witnessed (5:1)
Failing to testify against any wrongdoing you've been told about (5:1)
Touching an unclean animal (5:2)
Carelessly making an oath (5:4)
Deceiving a neighbor about something trusted to them (6:2)
Finding lost property and lying about it (6:3)
Bringing unauthorized fire before God (10:1)
Letting your hair become unkempt (10:6)
Tearing your clothes (10:6)
Drinking alcohol in holy places (10:9)
Eating an animal which doesn't both chew cud and has a divided hoof 
(ex:camel, rabbit, pig) (11:4-7) 
Touching the carcass of any of the above (11:8)
Eating – or touching the carcass of – any seafood without fins or scales (
11:10-12)
Eating – or touching the carcass of – eagle, the vulture, the black 
vulture, the red kite, any kind of black kite, any kind of raven, the 
horned owl, the screech owl, the gull, any kind of hawk, the little owl, 
the cormorant, the great owl, the white owl, the desert owl, the osprey, 
the stork, any kind of heron, the hoopoe and the bat. (11:13-19)
Eating – or touching the carcass of – flying insects with four legs, unless 
those legs are jointed (11:20-22)
Eating any animal which walks on all four and has paws (11:27)
Eating – or touching the carcass of – the weasel, the rat, any kind of 
great lizard,the gecko, the monitor lizard, the wall lizard, the skink and 
the chameleon (11:29)
Eating – or touching the carcass of – any creature which crawls on many 
legs, or its belly (11:41-42)
Going to church within 33 days after giving birth to a boy (12:4)
Going to church within 66 days after giving birth to a girl (12:5)
Lying (19:11)
Mixing fabrics in clothing (19:19) [polyester]
Planting different seeds in the same field (19:19)
Sleeping with another man’s slave (19:20) 
Eating fruit from a tree within four years of planting it (19:23)
Trimming your beard (19:27)
Cutting your hair at the sides (19:27)
Getting tattoos (19:28)
Mistreating foreigners (19:33-34)
Working on the Sabbath (23:3)

Sure, some of those are pretty common sense things, but also take a look at 
their penalties (you'll find them after the passages). Anything from a slap 
on the wrist to torture, enslavement, social alienation, and death. But 
remember, God loves you. Though if you wear polyester, get a haircut, shave 
your face, get a tattoo, eat bacon, or have only one testicle, then have 
fun in Hell, buddy!
comments.author: MrImagayguy

comments.text:
+TheHannes15 You want to start posting Bible passages? I can post a few 
that support selling your daughter, raping and imprisoning/enslaving women, 
abusing your kids, mass genocide, not shaving, not eating shell fish, the 
list goes on. You take a line and bastardize it to say gay people are bad 
when there's easily 20 times more passages that say eating shrimp is an 
affront to God. The Bible is nothing but an old book written 1900 years 
ago, edited drastically in the 1600's, that attempts to preserve the 
society and culture of a barbaric people who lived in the middle east and 
knew nothing about how the world works. It is the word of man, as with 
every other religious text. What's even worse is fools like you use that 
stupid book to take the rights away from people like myself. You use that 
book to deem us evil and condemn us to being tortured for all eternity? Not 
to get profane here but that is bullshit if I've ever seen it.
